title: 【Student Dormitory】Announcement of 2022-2023 Student Dormitory and 2023 Summer Dormitory Deposit Refund
author: 陳怡秀
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 陳怡秀 - yishoue@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6232
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Student Dormitory】Announcement of 2022-2023 Student Dormitory and 2023 Summer Dormitory Deposit Refund
日期： Tue, 5 Sep 2023 17:28:03 +0800
附檔： 住宿保證金複查表Student_Dormitory_Accommodation_Guarantee_Application_Form0925.doc (44 KB)   
Dear All,

1.	The results of the 2022-2023 Student Dormitory and 2023 Summer Dormitory Deposits have been announced. Please check it online by yourself. https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/DormStudent/Login.aspx
2.	If you have any questions regarding the deposit deduction from electricity fees and penalty fees, please fill in the form of deposit reassessment and seek reconfirmation no later than 2023/09/22(Fri) from the dorm manager before handing it in to the Office of Student Affairs and Student Living Services Division.
3.	Students who will be refunded their deposits, please confirm that the student's post office, account or bank name, branch name and account number have been filled up on the e-portfolio website, to ensure the smooth operation of the refund process.

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact: Ms. Chung at 03-8906217

Your safety, OSA's delight!

Student Living Services Division
Office of Student Affairs
